Successor of the last year's edition Champion is a new fragrance for men Champion Energy which arrives on the market in July 2011. The new fragrance for men will be available in the same flacon as previous edition Champion but composed of white cylindrical body and weights colored in metallic silver. The new masculine edition was created by perfumer Aurelien Guichard. Composition of Champion Energy opens with energetic and luminous notes of bergamot and grapefruit. A heart is ruled by galbanum and fresh cold spices while a base leaves a trail of cedar and oak moss. Advertising face of the new fragrance will be Tyler Wood. Champion Energy hits the shelves as 30 50 and 90 ml EDT accompanied by perfumed body care products.

Warm pleasant base notes feature sensual amber benzoin and oakmoss.Designer of the fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian while the bottle was designed by Thierry de Baschmakoff.

column17:
Product Description

Launched by the design house of Davidoff in 1988 Cool Water by Davidoff possesses a blend of lavender jasmine oakmoss musk sandalwood. It is recommended for daytime wear. What is a Tester? A Tester is a perfume with no fancy packaging but with the same exact fragrance at an even better price. They are just like the one used to test the perfume in a department store but supplied in a plain box and often have the word tester printed on the bottle. Sometimes they do not come with a cap or box. These items are great for personal use but may not be great as gifts. Our testers are new unopened and have never been sprayed (Testers and unboxed product are exactly the same as the regular perfume except testers usually come in a plain box--with or without a cap. Unboxed products are the perfume or bath product only without the box.)
